Chart.name: MostPopulous
Chart.query: SELECT Name, Population FROM World.country ORDER BY Population DESC LIMIT 10;

Chart.name: LeastPopulous
Chart.query: SELECT Name, Population FROM World.country ORDER BY Population ASC LIMIT 10;

Chart.name: CountryIndependenceByYear
Chart.query: SELECT IndepYear, COUNT(*) FROM world.country WHERE IndepYear >= 1980 GROUP BY IndepYear ORDER BY IndepYear ASC;
